summary: Remove unnecessary files from the PHP SDK composer package before release to reduce package size and distribution footprint. Files like tests, build configuration, and development tools should be excluded.
userImpact: Reduces the PHP SDK package size and removes unnecessary development files from end-user installations.
proposedFix: Exclude development and test directories from the composer package configuration (likely via .gitattributes or composer.json export-ignore)
resolutionDetails: Resolved via pull request #91 which implemented the exclusion of specified files from the composer package
keyQuote: Before release, we need to exclude a set of files from the composer package
